about_the_game:
BE THE GEOMOTH. DISCOVER GABE, DROQEN, AND PANCELOR’S NEW NON-LINEAR METROIDVANIA SET IN THE HEART OF A DYING COMPUTER.


Explore an abandoned computer's memory castle. Find and retrieve unique software modules.
Every module is powerful. Every power is useless. Every power will destroy the world.

Each chamber is a new problem. Carve a unique solution to reach your goal. Consume the world. When it’s too fragmented and depleted to continue, reset and start again.


FEATURES:
  • Jump, Dive, Float and Fly through over 100 interconnected chambers
  • Unlock over 30 unique powers to mutate your surroundings.
  • Moody Tech 8-bit* low res artstyle.
  • Over 3 minutes of ambient drone soundtrack.
  • Endlessly finishable in under 2 hours.
  • Activate the world.
  • View the moon
  • LOook at you, GEOMOTH. A pathetic creature of pixels and insect scales. Twitching and diving as you flutter through my corridors. How can you challenge an empty, meaningless machine?
  • Dive and glide through an empty, meaningless machine.
  • Go on an Adventure.

Find new software, break the game, end the world your way, and then go do something else.

*It’s 8-bit enough, we don’t know which bits are which

name: GEOMOTH BOOT SEQUENCE
short_description: Be THE GEOMOTH in the new nonlinear indie pixel art platformer metroidvania made by DROQEN, GABE, and PANCELOR in 2023-2024. Jump, Dive, Float, and Fly through over 100 interconnected chambers and unlock over 30 unique powers.
